name: P1 & The Rush of Bosses
description:
P1 & The Rush of Bosses features an adventure mode which cycles through 3 tiers (each with 5 bosses). When you think you're ready for them, try the 3 'cheat mode' exclusive bosses! Be warned, they're extremely hard!

To activate 'cheat mode,' hold X and C (or X and Z (or player 1's button 1 and button 2)) for five seconds. Use the arrow keys to navigate the boss selection menu, and release both X and C to select a boss. Bosses in tier 1-3 are ordered randomly, but the bosses in tier 4 are ordered by difficulty.
